content.rendered:
Cybercrime law

Cybercrime law help in the identification of acceptable behavior for information communication technology. It establishes legal and social sanctions to protect users.

The reason, why I could use this law, is that It helps to mitigate and prevent harm to people, it also preserves human rights. However, it facilitates an enabling environment for Investigation and prosecution of the crime committed online.

 

Substantive

It’s a law that defines the rights and the responsibilities of the legal subjects. However, the law prohibits a particular type of cybercrime. It punished non-compliance with these laws. Some of these crimes may include fraud, money laundering, and forgery.

Perpetrated cyberspace; hybrid or cyber-enabled as cyber dependant who has been more comfortable with the advancement of the internet technology. The law focused on substances of crime like the prohibited conduct and mental element.

 

Procedural law

This law guides how procedure and processes to be followed on substantive law to enhance law enforcement. During jurisdiction processes, law enforcement help to carry out cybercrime estimation. The jurisdiction provides a platform with power and authority to define cases with the torn territory. In cybercrime; jurisdiction is established due to the nationality of the offenders.

Online harassment and stalking is a violation of criminal laws and has been a significant problem in cyberspace. The legal system has strict rules to prohibit despicable crimes (Mehta, S., & Singh, V. 2013)

 

Cyber laws are very vital and encourage punishment to the criminal who commits crimes concerning computers. Type punishment will depend on the style of the rule broken, the person who offended, a screen of law violation, and place to live.

 

To create a safe and secret environment, implementing cyberspace to achieve a safe environment to people fiber platform.

 

Also read:strategic human resource management verses human resource management

Ranging in the field of Education after covid-19
